website_summaries.verdict: This variation of the classic Puma Roma showcases a new look for the silhouette. The iconic colors of the Ferrari are flaunted by this low-top shoe, giving it a more trendy appeal yet retains its classic aura. The Puma Ferrari Roma provide superb comfort and a lightweight feeling for the foot.The sleek design of the shoe offers versatility which makes the shoe able to match with a variety of outfit picks. With a price point that doesn’t leave a huge gash on the wallet, one can never go wrong with this shoe.
pros: A majority of the reviewers gushed about the extreme comfort that the Puma Ferrari Roma provides
The shoe feels lightweight on foot as what a good number of users expressed
A handful of consumers admired the good quality of the sneaker
Many users loved the nostalgia about the retro aspect of the shoe
Several buyers highly appreciated the versatility of the shoe when it comes to style
The Ferrari Roma from the Jumping Cat sneakers' collection is available in colorways that represent the signature color of Ferrari
A lot purchased the shoe as it is affordable and offers good value for the money
cons: Several buyers claimed that the Puma Ferrari Roma feels tight on foot as it runs narrow
Many reviewers complained about the shoe running small
Some of the consumers pointed out that the shoe may need some break-in period

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Ferrari Roma Sneaker
product_meta.description: The SF roma is the motorsport interpretation of this PUMA archive shoe. This lightweight training shoe was equipped with comfort-enhancing features such as a padded tongue and orthopedic arch supports. This sport-turned-street style features an all-over leather upper for a clean look and feel. Its eva midsole gives perfect cushioning, and it has a strengthened toecap and heel.
